definition: secondary normal school (secondary school that trains kindergarten and elementary school teachers)
pinyin: zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4
Han2 shan1 Shi1 fan4 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: She is a student of a teachers college.
sentences.chinese: 她是師範學院的一名學生。

sentences.english: Cheng Zhengmin Professor, School of Literature, Beijing Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 程正民，北京師範大學文學院教授。

sentences.english: When Lin Ying graduated from Zhengzhou Normal University, she decided not to apply for a job straight away.
sentences.chinese: 林英從鄭州師範大學畢業時，她決定不立即去找工作。

sentences.english: The examined specimens are deposited in the Institute of Entomology, Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 研究標本保存於瀋陽師範大學昆蟲研究所。

sentences.english: Mr. Erma's school is a showcase campus.
sentences.chinese: Erma先生的學校被定爲師範性校園。

sentences.english: The Monday venue is the Foreign Affairs Hotel of Shenyang Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 週一的口試考場爲瀋陽師範大學外事賓館。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effectiveness of health education on AIDS prevention among normal university students.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價師範院校大學生預防艾滋病健康教育的效果。

sentences.english: The subjects of this study were 83 students of English majors from a key Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 研究對象爲一重點師範院校的83名英語專業學生。

sentences.english: Journal of Kangding Nationality Teachers College.
sentences.chinese: 康定民族師範高等專科學校學報。

sentences.english: Fifth, to realize the elastic course management of higher teacher education.
sentences.chinese: 第五，加快實現高等師範教育課程管理的彈性化。

sentences.english: The victim, identified by his surname Lu, was a freshman in Sichuan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 這位受害人姓盧，是四川師範大學的一名大一新生。

sentences.english: The cultivation goal of Pre-primary Teacher Training School is to train qualified teachers for the society.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒師範學校的目標是培養合格的幼兒教師。

sentences.english: In 1897, Jiangsu had the first normal school.
sentences.chinese: 1897年，江蘇出現了第一所師範學堂。

sentences.english: 1979-1983, Bachelor of Science, Hunan Normal University.
sentences.chinese: 1983年，湖南師範大學，理學學士學位。

sentences.english: The new curriculum reform and free normal college students have some impact and enlightenment to teaching practice.
sentences.chinese: 新課改和免費師範生對教育實習有一定的衝擊和啓示。

sentences.english: And discover the deficiency that Changchun art school there exists in music teacher quality out of.
sentences.chinese: 並從中發現幼兒師範學校音樂教師素質存在的不足。

definition: Shandong, province in northeast China, short name 魯|鲁[Lu3], capital Jinan 濟南|济南[Ji3 nan2]
